description: The history tracks changes made to the case episode for auditing purposes.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the action taken by the user.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Update Case Types


Update Case Status


Update Enrolling Step


Update Closed Reason


Update Review Due Date


Update Review Frequency Unit


Update Review Frequency Length


Update Sensitivity


Update Start Date


Update Department


Update Tracking Status


Update Declined Reason

Update Linked Medications


Support & Services Provided changed

Update Episode Type

Review Case

columns.name: ACTION_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user that updated the case episode.

columns.name: ASSOC_VALUE_RAW_DATA
columns.description: Stores the new value or record associated with the action taken on the case episode.

columns.name: REMOVING_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user that removed the associated value (I HSB 18440) from the case episode.

columns.name: ACTION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time (UTC) on which the history action was taken.

columns.name: REMOVED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Store the date and time (UTC) on which the associated value (I HSB 18440) was removed from the case episode.

columns.name: ACTION_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time (local) on which the history action was taken.

columns.name: REMOVED_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time (local) on which the associated value (I HSB 18440) was removed from the case episode.

columns.name: CASE_TEAM_LINE
columns.description: Store a line from the case team, if the history value (I HSB 18440) is associated with the case team.

columns.name: ACTION_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Case Management History Item - The encounter that set the value on the case episode, if the history value  (I HSB 18440) is associated with an encounter.

columns.name: REMOVING_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Case Management History Item - The encounter that removed the value on the case episode, if the history  value (I HSB 18440) is associated with an encounter.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_TYPE_C
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 1-Update Case Type, this column holds the associated case type value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_STATUS_C
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 2-Update Case Status, this column holds the associated case status value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_ENROLLING_STEP_C
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 3-Update Enrolling Step, this column holds the associated enrolling step value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_CLOSED_REASON_C
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 5-Update Closed Reason, this column holds the associated closed reason value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_REVIEW_DUE_DATE
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 6-Update Review Due Date, this column holds the associated review due date value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_REV_FREQ_UNIT_C
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 7-Update Review Frequency Unit, this column holds the associated review frequency unit value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_REV_FREQ_LENGTH
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 8-Update Review Frequency Length, this column holds the associated review frequency length value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_SENSITIVITY_C
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 9-Update Sensitivity, this column holds the associated sensitivity value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_TRACKING_STATUS_C
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 12-Update Tracking Status, this column holds the associated tracking status value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 11-Update Department, this column holds the associated department ID value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_END_DATE
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 14-Update End Date, this column holds the associated end date value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_START_DATE
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 10-Update Start Date, this column holds the associated start date value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_DECLINE_REASON_C
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 13-Update Declined Reason, this column holds the associated declined reason value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_MED_PRBLM_LIST_ID
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 15-Update Linked Medications, this column holds the associated medication ID value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_SSP_CHANGED_LINE
columns.description: The line number in CMGMT_SUPPORT_TYPE_HX that contains a copy of the previous support & services provided. The updated support and services provided will be in the next line of CMGMT_SUPPORT_TYPE_HX, or in I HSB 64050 if there are no more lines.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 19-Link Referral, this column holds the associated referral.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 20-Link Claim, this column holds the associated claim.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_EFF_DATE
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 21 - Update Effective Date, this column holds the associated effective date value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_TERMINATION_DATE
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 22 - Update Termination Date, this column holds the associated termination date value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_TRTMNT_TEAM_REL_C
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 23 - Update Relationship, this column holds the associated case team relationship value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_IS_PRIMARY_YN
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 24 - Update Primary, this column holds the associated Primary? value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.

columns.name: ASSOC_CMGMT_PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: When the action taken by the user is 25-Update Linked Problems, this column holds the associated problem ID value. This column is derived from the Assoc_Value_Raw_Data column.
